alert.note: Alert for Orange (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:01PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Orange County through 630 PM EDT... At 601 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Avalon Park, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Wedgefield, Avalon Park, University Of Central Florida and Bithlo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
